name: two truths and a...
description:
(PLEASE NOTE: The game does not yet contain any sound.)

When wind turbines begin to mysteriously appear at the edge of a small New England town, only two girls bore witness to the strange events that followed. Play as either Ivy or Rashida and let the events of one strange summer unfold as they experience it, and decide for yourself what's true when you start to feel you can no longer trust your own senses, and even your memory.

two truths and a... is a psychological horror game built in Twine 1.4 with Sugarcube 2 for the My First Game Jam: Summer Edition 2016.

It is also super not done! Right now only a portion of each route is playable and there are only dead ends, but when the game is finished there will be multiple endings, plus audio.
